title: What prominent politicians played a major role in escalating the Vietnam War and how? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Lyndon.B.Johnson,I would say. He sent 500 thousand young American men into jungles of Vietnam. That give North Vietnam a reason to sent troops,attacking South Vietnam territories. His decision made him unpopular with American,so he didn’t run again for presidency.Instead,Richard Nixon took the office in 20th January of 1969 and work on to fix Johnson messes in Vietnam.
